website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly bag that will safeguard your inflatable stand up paddleboard from the elements.
pros: Comes with shoulder and waist straps for seamless transport
Includes an outer bungee system for carrying your inflatable pump
Boasts Velcro straps to help you seal your inflatable paddleboard inside the bag
Features a first-rate nylon outer shell
cons: Does not offer as much space as comparable paddleboard bags
Opening of the bag is not very wide

customer_reviews.title: Do It.
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this bag for my inflatable Ten Toes bored and everything fits awesome. Flew it to Hawaii and it all made it safe and sound. The bag has been holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Chani Thorum

customer_reviews.title: Love the Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: My SUP plus a lot of extras fit in the bag. Did take my SUP on the plane to TX and it held up great! I was a bit worried but it was perfect! Now I feel more at ease and will be taking my SUP with me when I travel!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything all in one place and can just throw in the trunk so I can go SUP anytime anyplace. Very roomy although pretty heavy, not sure who would backpack this to a water location.
customer_reviews.author: jbk

customer_reviews.title: Pass!  Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wish we could return it, but the return window has closed. We used the bag once and it tore. We certainly have not been hard on this bag and it is already in rough shape from 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: River Summers

customer_reviews.title: Fits our SUP perfectly. I have the Tower Adventurer ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our SUP perfectly. I have the Tower Adventurer 2. If you're careful, you can even fit the pump and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cole

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, my SUP fold sup and fits right in along with the fin, patch kit, paddle and pump. The only issue is when I was tightening the outside bungee around the pump, one of the grommets ripped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect size for the inflatable board
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for the inflatable board. I have not been down to the lake yet, but have inflated and deflated the board and have been able to put the board and pump in and out on my own. I weigh 115 and can carry the board on my own back. This bag is a must if purchasing the board and you plan to transport it anywhere and need a place to store it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all of your iSUP stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything...board, paddle, and extras. Great buy. I'm concerned about how the mesh sides will hold up over the summer of constant use. I will update the post if needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice and much better in the end
customer_reviews.text: Initially I had not purchased the carrying bag with the board. Thought I had a wheeled duffle that would fit. It didn't, thus ordered carrying bag. It is very nice and much better in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and love Isle Surf and Sup products
customer_reviews.text: I have this bag for my paddle board and my mom got a lesser quality one that works well but the bag fell apart. Great quality and love Isle Surf and Sup products!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R Montero

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever! Crazy big backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever.... Price was very good. I use it as an extra bag in case I need it, when I am not using it for my iSUP Board. I can carry up with my long freediving fins, my drone backpack inside and an standard backpack (25 Lt) with my stuff. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bag seems very nice. I haven't been able to get to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems very nice. I haven't been able to get to the water yet, but it seems that the bag with drain well, and hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SUP carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my ISLE SUP nicely with a little room for extras. Glad I bought it, much easier to take my SUP to the beach or on trips.
customer_reviews.author: csenje

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must
customer_reviews.text: Essential complement to your new inflatable board. Allows you to carry everything you need associated with paddle boarding (including deflated paddle board) in one nice, compact bag.
customer_reviews.author: James Thames

customer_reviews.title: Able to get my inflatable SUP in and out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Able to get my inflatable SUP in and out of the storage bag with ease and able to fit all my gear in one space. Also fits very well into the trunk of my car when needed for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: SUP Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Good workmanship. Fits my Tower paddle boards at a 1/3 of the price
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Diane Heglar

customer_reviews.title: Not actually white
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a description of the color. I thought I was getting a white colored bag, but it turned out to be gray. Here's a pic of it next to a white ISUP.
customer_reviews.author: K Chan

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 9ft9in inflatable SUP, plus the paddle, and the pump. Really good strong material.
customer_reviews.author: AI620

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and roomy- fit my ISUP, detachable fin, leash and pump. It's heavy with all that in it, but the backpack straps disperse it evenly across my back, leVing my hands free to carry other things or hold my kids' hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dinice Scheihing

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice,sturdy but light weight,plenty of room for my 10 foot isup, love my purchase! It has a small hoop to hold onto to make it easy to lift up onto my shoulder for the backpack part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. It is especially made for the inflatable board and everything fits in it. I only wish it had some side pockets for extra items, but you can fit everything no problem. It's made with really good quality materials. I hope it sustain all the use I will be giving it. So far is a total success!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly inexpensive and it works great. Fits all my gear
customer_reviews.author: Tana graham

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier with our
customer_reviews.text: This is the prefect bag to carry the paddle board. couldn't be happier with our purchae
customer_reviews.author: Norma Dokken

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works well and carries everything. so far so good
customer_reviews.author: gavi

customer_reviews.title: good. nothing fancy but the backpack straps work
customer_reviews.text: good. nothing fancy but the backpack straps work. I like the Red one much better but it is twice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: THSB

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this...it does the job...a small external.pocket would be fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sandrine Levrier

customer_reviews.title: Paddleboard carrier
customer_reviews.text: Well made, protective cover/carrier for my tower 9' inflatable paddle board. Would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pack, have Tower 10' inflatable board and the pump, paddle, and SUP fit in it nicely
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. It would be a five star bag if it had an outside compartment that you could securely slide other accessories into such as a paddle and safety harness...
customer_reviews.author: Middleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this SUP backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this SUP backpack! Everything fits nicely and then some room is left over! We have two boards and one came with a bag, but we are going to buy another ISLE surf and SUP backpack for it instead! Much nicer than the duffle type bags! 👍
customer_reviews.author: ryan l mace

customer_reviews.title: Buy this backpack if you have an inflatable SUP!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and easy to carry a heavy inflatable SUP plus paddle in!
customer_reviews.author: HollyPeck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but pricy. I was able to fit my 11'6" isup and paddle, but not the air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my isup.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Tower Adventurer 2, 3 piece paddle, and a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin I.

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I thought it would be. I can fit my SUP, paddle, and pfd in the bag easily. It makes transporting my gear much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality and durable. Fit my tower paddle board perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Tower Adventurer 2 just fine, seems sturdy. I wish it had a pocket for small stuff and not just some bungee cords but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: This back pack is perfect and fits board
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is perfect and fits board, paddle and pump with room for extras! The bag was shipped within hours of ordering! I love this company!
customer_reviews.author: ekyle

customer_reviews.title: but was impressed with the construction - seems to be sturdy and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it fully, but was impressed with the construction - seems to be sturdy and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excelent.
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product. It's most then I expected. I recomend. Simple but eficient. And beautiful. A price is atractive, It's OK
customer_reviews.author: Frederico

customer_reviews.title: Got what I was looking for inexpensive board I could store easy. This does the trick
customer_reviews.text: The paddle that comes with it does break down well for storage but it is heavy and cheap. The board inflation is simple with pump and works well. Holds my weight 260. Doesn't come with a storage bag which I had to buy extra. Did have a strap. Got what I was looking for inexpensive board I could store easy. This does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Marche

customer_reviews.title: great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, great for traveling. Should be included when buy the SUP board.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Cohen

customer_reviews.title: easy to load and unload
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a present. I'm not crazy enough to go paddling around on a SUP of any kind, let alone one that is inflatable. Judging from the amount of use it got this summer, it was a VERY well received gift. Roomy, easy to load and unload. feels pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Elemental

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the purchase. All us good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L.

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: Love it – easy to carry and fits all the key items!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great. Make sure you leave it rolled out when ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 1 season. Used about a dozen time. So far it's great. Make sure you leave it rolled out when you get home to let it dry. Wish it came w a bag - I had to buy that separately
customer_reviews.author: FarmMom

product_meta.title: ISLE Inflatable SUP Carrying Bag - Fits Any iSUP up to 12'6 | Convenient Backpack Style
product_meta.description: The Isle Inflatable SUP Bag can carry up to a 12ft 6 inch iSUP for one low flat price. Protect your inflatable SUP from elements when you are out and about or store it away. Comes with shoulder and waist straps for easy transport. Also includes an outer bungee system for carrying your inflatable pump. Bag measures at 36 Inches x 14 Inches x 12 Inches.
feature_bullets: Outer Bungee System for carrying Inflatable Pump
Fits most inflatable paddle boards / Bag Dimensions (36 Inches x 14 Inches x 12 Inches)
Easy to carry, perfect for checking it on to flights
